tool_description:
Serpdog(https://serpdog.io) is a Google Search API that allows you to access Google Search Results in real time. It solves the problem of proxies and captchas for a smooth scraping journey. Serpdog supports results in both HTML and JSON format.

Get your free trial by registering at https://api.serpdog.io

If you want to buy our plan, I recommend you to please visit https://serpdog.io/pricing for more information.
name: Google Search 2
title: Google Search 2

api_list.name: Google Maps Reviews
api_list.description: Using this API you can get the JSON data of the review results.

api_list.name: Google Maps Data ID
api_list.description: Using this API you can get the JSON results of the data ID of a particular place.

api_list.name: Google Images
api_list.description: Using this API you can get the JSON data of the image results.

api_list.name: Google Videos
api_list.description: Using this API you can get the JSON data of the video results.

api_list.name: Google News
api_list.description: Using this API you can get the JSON data of the news results.

api_list.name: Autocomplete Results
api_list.description: Use this API to get suggestions based on the entered keyword.

api_list.name: Organic Results
api_list.description: Using this API you can get the JSON data of the organic search results.
